title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Percentage of population has decreased over the Year
Percentage of population is gradually constant from 2005 to 2009, gradually decreasing from 2009 to 2011, and lastly slightly constant from 2011 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Max Percentage of population about 10.0 was recorded at Year 2005
Min Percentage of population about 2.0 was recorded at Year 2017
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2005 to 2012.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
